verses.esv: 23 Whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord and not for men,
verses.kjv: 23 And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;
verses.niv: 23 Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for men,

verses.esv: 4 Fathers, do not provoke your children to anger, but bring them up in the discipline and instruction of the Lord.
verses.kjv: 4 And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.
verses.niv: 4 Fathers, do not exasperate your children; instead, bring them up in the training and instruction of the Lord.

verses.esv:
3   Behold, children are a heritage from the LORD,
    the fruit of the womb a reward.
verses.kjv: 3 Lo, children are an heritage of the LORD: and the fruit of the womb is his reward.
verses.niv: 3 Sons are a heritage from the LORD, children a reward from him.

verses.esv: 27 Religion that is pure and undefiled before God the Father is this: to visit orphans and widows in their affliction, and to keep oneself unstained from the world.
verses.kjv: 27 Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this, To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction, and to keep himself unspotted from the world.
verses.niv: 27 Religion that God our Father accepts as pure and faultless is this: to look after orphans and widows in their distress and to keep oneself from being polluted by the world.

verses.esv: 4 and so train the young women to love their husbands and children,
verses.kjv: 4 That they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,
verses.niv: 4 Then they can train the younger women to love their husbands and children,

verses.esv: 44 For behold, when the sound of your greeting came to my ears, the baby in my womb leaped for joy.
verses.kjv: 44 For, lo, as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears, the babe leaped in my womb for joy.
verses.niv: 44 As soon as the sound of your greeting reached my ears, the baby in my womb leaped for joy.

verses.esv:
15   Did not he who made me in the womb make him?
    And did not one fashion us in the womb?
verses.kjv: 15 Did not he that made me in the womb make him? and did not one fashion us in the womb?
verses.niv: 15 Did not he who made me in the womb make them? Did not the same one form us both within our mothers?

verses.esv:
16   Or why was I not as a hidden stillborn child,
    as infants who never see the light?
verses.kjv: 16 Or as an hidden untimely birth I had not been; as infants which never saw light.
verses.niv: 16 Or why was I not hidden in the ground like a stillborn child, like an infant who never saw the light of day?

verses.esv: 7 then the LORD God formed the man of dust from the ground and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life, and the man became a living creature.
verses.kjv: 7 And the LORD God formed man of the dust of the ground, and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life; and man became a living soul.
verses.niv: 7 the LORD God formed the man from the dust of the ground and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life, and the man became a living being.

verses.esv: 38 And Peter said to them, “Repent and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins, and you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
verses.kjv: 38 Then Peter said unto them, Repent, and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins, and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost.
verses.niv: 38 Peter replied, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

verses.esv:
15   Though he slay me, I will hope in him;
    yet I will argue my ways to his face.
verses.kjv: 15 Though he slay me, yet will I trust in him: but I will maintain mine own ways before him.
verses.niv: 15 Though he slay me, yet will I hope in him; I will surely defend my ways to his face.

verses.esv: 16 Whoever believes and is baptized will be saved, but whoever does not believe will be condemned.
verses.kjv: 16 He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved; but he that believeth not shall be damned.
verses.niv: 16 Whoever believes and is baptized will be saved, but whoever does not believe will be condemned.

verses.esv:
3   “Let the day perish on which I was born,
    and the night that said,
    ‘A man is conceived.’
verses.kjv: 3 Let the day perish wherein I was born, and the night in which it was said, There is a man child conceived.
verses.niv: 3 "May the day of my birth perish, and the night it was said, 'A boy is born!'
